Information about me.

I am a Baruch College graduate and have a BA in Computer Information System with minor in Mathematics. I believe my education as well as my past project working experience provided me with the experience and skills necessary to excel in Web Developmen t field. I know that my ability to quickly learn new coding languages, my passion to mathematics, soft skills, problem-solving, time managment skills, great ability to work as a part of a team as well as independetly and creativity, as well as ‘can do attitude’, makes me a very good fit for this field.
